data.title: How to Download and Install Pinnacle Studio on Windows?
data.meta_description: A Computer Science portal for geeks. It contains well written, well thought and well explained computer science and programming articles, quizzes and practice/competitive programming/company interview Questions.
data.text:
Pinnacle Studio Video editing software is a paid video editor, with 15 days free trial. The ultimate aim of the pinnacle video editing software is to use your passion, to build powerful products, with high precision. Pinnacle studio has advanced tools like Stop Motion animation, multicam editing, split screen video, etc. As to public opinion, it’s a professional tool at a fraction of the price. It also provides an advanced feature i.e. DVD Authoring, which is generally not provided by a majority of video editor software. The color possibilities in a video can be enhanced to the next level by pinnacle, it provides, color correction, selective color, LUTs, and filters. The software is only available for windows users and does not support macOS, at least at the time when we are writing this blog. In this article, we will learn how to download and install Pinnacle Studio Video Editing Software on windows.

Download and Install Pinnacle Studio Video Editing Software on Windows

The following steps to install the Pinnacle studio video editing software are:

Step 1: Go to Pinnacle Studio’s, website. On the home page, you will find a button for the download name Download Trial.

Step 2: The download will begin automatically, if it doesn’t start, then click on the click here button, to start the download.

Step 3: The download begins, and the name of the file is PinnacleTrial_ESD.exe. The download size of the file is 5.6MB, at the time when we are writing this blog. Now, you might be surprised how come to video editing software can have such a low download size, but remember your childhood when you might have downloaded Gameloft games, like Asphalt Nitro, Dragon mania, etc, that were also of the same size but as soon as we download it the real download starts that might be in GBs, the same procedure has been software. This 5 MB file just downloads a UI for you so that the real software could download.

Step 4: Open the .exe file after downloading, we could view the license agreement page, and check the box I accept the terms in the license agreement. Then, click on the Next button.

Step 5: The registration page is opened, add your basic details like First name, Last name, Region, and Email Address. Then, check the box, whether you want to receive their updates on emails or not. Then, click on the Next button.

Step 6: Select, the path of your software. For example, E:\pinnacle_studio. Then, click on the Download/Install button.

Step 7: The download begins, now, we could view the actual size of the software i.e. 1.65GB. We have to wait until the download finishes.

Step 8: The software has been successfully downloaded. Then click on the Launch Pinnacle Studio button.

Step 9: We could view the home page of the pinnacle studio software.
